name: .NET + Angular Developer
description:
We are currently looking for .NET Developer (e-commerce projects for an international e-commerce company).

Responsibilities:

  • Project ONE Phase II. The work for this project will be to either make enhancements to the existing ASP.NET Web Forms applications or to migrate them to an Angular frontend application that uses .NET Core Web API web services and stores data in SQL Server databases.

  • New development of a Party Management Application. The application will be written using an Angular frontend application which interacts with .NET Core Web API web services that store data in a SQL Server database. The plan is to deploy this application to AWS.

  • Support for our Contest and ContestAdmin web applications. Both are written using Angular for the frontend and the web services are written using .NET Core Web API.

  • Support for an internal mobile application. The mobile application is written in NativeScript using Angular and the web services are written using .NET Core Web API.

Requirements:

  • An Analytical and Critical Thinker
  • Ability to understand existing code and refactor it into data, business, service and presentation layers
  • C#
  • ASP.NET .NET Framework, .NET Core, .NET Core Web API, MVC and Web Forms
  • Angular
  • TypeScript/JavaScript
  • ADO.NET (DataSet, DataTable, DataView, DataReader, SqlDataAdapter, SqlConnection, SqlCommand)
  • SQL Server and Stored Procedures

Company Offers:

  • Permanent remote job

  • Flexible schedule

  • Decent salary

  • International team

  • Daily practice of communication and correspondence in English

  • Laptop, headphones, etc will be provided
  • Relocation to Georgia (optional)
